imdb.plot outline: "Guess Who? The Soldier" Is one of a series of short PBS videos. The video seeks to challenge children's beliefs about gender stereotypes, by showing men and women in non-traditional jobs. This candid video focuses on children's views of who soldiers are, and there surprise that a women could be a soldier in the US Air Force.
imdb.title: Guess Who? The Soldier

production companies.name: University of Southern California, School of Cinematic Arts
